definition: nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: But a small portion of undesirable elements also make use of rented dens .
sentences.chinese: 但是一小部分不良分子也利用租用的窝点。

sentences.english: Shenze Public Security Bureau has successfully destroyed a city of gambling dens.
sentences.chinese: 深泽县公安局城区分局日前成功捣毁一赌博窝点。

definition: to track down and seize (a criminal suspect, contraband etc)
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
sudden unannounced investigation/on-the-spot inspection/to search without notification
